concept.display: Chemodenervation of muscles(s); muscle(s) innervated by facial nerve, unilateral (e.g.m for blepharospasm, hemifacial spasm)
Chemodenervation of muscles(s); muscle(s) innervated by facial, trigeminal, cervical, spinal and accessory nerves, bilateral (e.g., for chronic migraine)
